thread.title: 15 Celebrities Who Managed To Have Boobs AND Be Feminists
thread.title_full: 15 Celebrities Who Managed To Have Boobs AND Be Feminists

author: Jasmin Nahar
title: 15 Celebrities Who Managed To Have Boobs AND Be Feminists
text:
View this image › 
Frederick M. Brown / Getty Images ID: 10645369 2. Despite the whole mammaries thing, Mindy Kaling is still able to talk about workplace sexism . View this image › 
Pascal Le Segretain / Getty Images I know, right?!
ID: 10645459 3. Lady Gaga’s boobs have yet to stop her from speaking up for sexual assault survivors ! View this image › 
Frazer Harrison / Getty Images ID: 10645416 4. Ellen Page has, shockingly, been vocal about women needing better access to Plan B , even though she has boobs. View this image › 
Jason Kempin / Getty Images ID: 10645379 5. I know what you’re thinking, “but wait, Beyoncé has boobs! How can she care about feminism?”. And yet, she wrote a powerful essay about gender equality ! View this image › 
Brad Barket / Getty Images You’d have thought her boobs would get in the way of the keyboard, maybe she has voice controls.
ID: 10645387 6. Here’s Maggie Gyllenhaal, accomplishing the feat of having breasts while also caring about ageism against women in Hollywood. View this image › 
Alberto E. Rodriguez / Getty Images She can do two things at once!
ID: 10645390 7. Viola Davis cares about the lack of opportunities when it comes to roles for women of colour, in spite of the whole “having boobs” situation! View this image › 
Leon Bennett / Getty Images ID: 10645376 8. In between having breasts, Laverne Cox ALSO manages to frequently advocate for the rights and healthcare of transgender people . View this image › 
Earl Gibson Iii / Getty Images ID: 10645394 9. Shonda Rhimes believes that women and people of colour are more than the media tropes they’re reduced to, plus like, she has boobs too! View this image › 
Earl Gibson Iii / Getty Images ID: 10645404 10. Don’t let the fact she has breast tissue fool you, Nicole Kidman does in fact care about helping women who are victims of violence. View this image › 
Chris Jackson / Getty Images Wearing a low-cut dress didn’t stop the U.N from making her one of their ambassadors, who’d have thought?
ID: 10645677 11. Kerry Washington’s chest somehow didn’t impede her ability to talk about the impossibly high standards women are held to. View this image › 
Alberto E. Rodriguez ID: 10645409 12. And Constance Wu’s boobs seemed to have no impact on her criticising the mistreatment of women in the entertainment industry! View this image › 
Frederick M. Brown / Getty Images ID: 10645471 13. Yes, she does have boobs, but Gina Rodriguez also set up a foundation to empower women on low incomes through arts education! View this image › 
Valerie Macon / AFP / Getty Images ID: 10645491 14. And get this, self-proclaimed “ card-carrying, radical feminist ” Emma Thompson? She has them too . View this image › 
Anthony Harvey / Getty Images Scandalous .
ID: 10645641 15. And finally, yes, Emma Watson can both have boobs and the ability to believe in gender equality . View this image › 
Frazer Harrison / Getty Images I’m starting to think these two things are not linked in any way!
ID: 10646126 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
  More News About Emma Watson Jasmin Nahar is a junior staff writer at BuzzFeed UK and is based in London.
